summary: To offset U.S. conventional warfighting advantages, opponents try to use the information environment, including information technology and social media. Actions can range from trying to plant malware in weapons to spreading disinformation on social media. This report describes DOD's use and protection of the information environment. We profile 6 areas—such as threats and emerging technologies—and offer questions for further oversight. For example, DOD components identified...
title: Information Environment: Opportunities and Threats to DOD's National Security Mission
